title: The Flight of the Sparrow
description: The Sparrow is a state-of-the-art surveillance aircraft. When itâ€™s stolen one night from the research facility that designed it, David Larkin and his partner Samantha Colt are hired to find it and get it back. They track it to a secret underground military base, where they encounter an army of ruthless mercenaries and uncover a conspiracy that could get them both killed.
author: Ken Cressman
